contentPage.notDisplayContect: There is currently no content to display in this section. This may be because you do not have an active subscription or there is no content available, please contact us.

loginPage.title: Sign in
loginPage.passwordRecoveryTitle: We have sent you an email
loginPage.passwordRecoveryDescription: Check your email and follow the instructions to reset your password; then, come back here to log in.
loginPage.qrStepsTitle: Follow these steps on your computer or mobile device
loginPage.qrStep1Description: Scan the QR code with your phone's camera or visit:
loginPage.qrStep2Description: Enter or confirm the login code:
loginPage.qrStep3Description: Sign in. Your TV will be ready to watch!

errorForm.unAuthorizedCode: The device has not been entered yet

errorPlanSessionModal.killer: This session was closed on {{date}} by this device:
errorPlanSessionModal.manyPeople: There are many people using your account, to continue viewing, you must close an account and try again.
errorPlanSessionModal.notPlans: You are not currently subscribed to any plan for this device, contact us and choose your preferred plan!
errorPlanSessionModal.connection: Currently could not connect to the server. Please check your Internet connection and try again later.

confirmDeleteModal.title: Delete profile
confirmDeleteModal.askDelete: Are you sure you want to delete the profile?

error.connection: Server connection error. Check your internet connection
error.cannotDelete: This profile cannot be deleted, please select another one

errorComponent.connectionCouldNotEstablished: The connection could not be established
errorComponent.tryingToConnect: We encountered a problem while trying to connect. We recommend checking your internet connection and trying again in a few moments.
errorComponent.extendedMessage: If the error persists please contact us.
errorComponent.errorRestoringService: There was a problem. We are restoring service.
errorComponent.youCurrentlyDoNotHavePlan: You currently do not have a plan that allows viewing on this type of device. Please contact the [ProductName] team.
errorComponent.youCurrentlyDoNotHaveAnyActiveSubscripti: You currently do not have any active subscriptions. Please contact the [ProductName] team.
errorComponent.youCurrentlyDoNotHaveSufficientBalance: You currently do not have sufficient balance to continue watching content.

exitModal.title: Go out
exitModal.askExit: Are you sure you want to exit?
exitModal.askLogout: Are you sure you want to log out on this device?

error.connectionCouldNotEstablished: The connection could not be established

search.noResults: There are no results for your search, but we can recommend the following:
